flavorText: "Time is like the Luxa River—though it flows in one direction, it can be diverted."

foreignData.flavorText: „Zeit ist wie der Luxa: Auch wenn sie nur in eine Richtung fließt, so kann sie doch umgelenkt werden."
foreignData.name: Wesir der fallenden Sande
foreignData.text:

Umwandlung {1}{U} ({1}{U}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
Wenn du den Wesir der fallenden Sande umwandelst, enttappe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "El tiempo es como el río Luxa: aunque fluye en una dirección, puede desviarse".

foreignData.flavorText: « Le temps est semblable au fleuve Luxa : même s'il s'écoule dans une direction, il peut être détourné. »

foreignData.flavorText: "Il tempo è come il fiume Luxa: sebbene scorra in una direzione, può essere deviato."

foreignData.flavorText: 「時の流れはルクサ川のようなものだが、川と違い時間は逆転できる。」

foreignData.flavorText: «Время подобно реке Лукса — оно течет в одном направлении, но его можно заставить свернуть в сторону».

name: Vizier of Tumbling Sands
originalText:
{T}: Untap another target permanent.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Vizier of Tumbling Sands, untap target permanent.

rulings.text: Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability doesn’t resolve (due to being countered with Disallow, for example, or if the triggered ability’s targets have become illegal), the other ability will still resolve.

text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Vizier of Tumbling Sands, untap target permanent.
